title: What were the Queen's Club tennis results?
description: Carlos Alcaraz and Jack Draper headlined the action Tuesday at the HSBC Championships, where both men — the top two seeds — advanced to the Round of 16. Qualifier Corentin Moutet also earned an upset victory against third seed Taylor Fritz. View all of Tuesday's results from the ATP 500 event held at Queen's Club below. text: London Queens Club Top seed Alcaraz advances on Tuesday June 18, 2025 Luke Walker/Getty Images for LTA Andy Murray Arena is centre court at Queen's Club in London. By ATP Staff Carlos Alcaraz and Jack Draper headlined the action Tuesday at the HSBC Championships, where both men — the top two seeds — advanced to the Round of 16. Qualifier Corentin Moutet also earned an upset victory against third seed Taylor Fritz. View all of Tuesday's results from the ATP 500 event held at Queen's Club below. html:
London Queens Club

Top seed Alcaraz advances on Tuesday

June 18, 2025

Luke Walker/Getty Images for LTA

Andy Murray Arena is centre court at Queen's Club in London. By ATP Staff

Carlos Alcaraz and Jack Draper headlined the action Tuesday at the HSBC Championships, where both men — the top two seeds — advanced to the Round of 16. Qualifier Corentin Moutet also earned an upset victory against third seed Taylor Fritz.

View all of Tuesday's results from the ATP 500 event held at Queen's Club below.

Results - Tuesday, 17 June 2025

Men's Singles - Round of 32
Jiri Lehecka (CZE) d [5] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 64 62
[2] Jack Draper (GBR) d Jenson Brooksby (USA) 63 61
[1] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d [LL] Adam Walton (AUS) 64 76(4)
[Q] Corentin Moutet (FRA) d [3] Taylor Fritz (USA) 67(5) 76(7) 75
Brandon Nakashima (USA) d Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) 67(10) 76(5) 64
[LL] Arthur Rinderknech (FRA) d [6] Ben Shelton (USA) 76(5) 76(4)
Jaume Munar (ESP) d Jordan Thompson (AUS) 75 Retired
Gabriel Diallo (CAN) d [WC] Billy Harris (GBR) 61 36 64
Alexei Popyrin (AUS) d [Q] Aleksandar Vukic (AUS) 62 67(9) 76(3)
Reilly Opelka (USA) d Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) 76(6) 64

Men's Doubles - Round of 16
[WC] Jacob Fearnley (GBR)/Cameron Norrie (GBR) d [3] Joe Salisbury (GBR)/Neal Skupski (GBR) 63 36 13-11
[WC] David Stevenson (GBR)/Marcus Willis (GBR) d Hugo Nys (MON)/Edouard Roger-Vasselin (FRA) 76(5) 67(3) 10-3
[Q] Rohan Bopanna (IND)/Sander Gille (BEL) d Jakub Mensik (CZE)/Holger Rune (DEN) 76(1) 67(5) 10-6
Nikola Mektic (CRO)/Michael Venus (NZL) d Brandon Nakashima (USA)/Frances Tiafoe (USA) 75 62
